title: Notice of intent to demand payment
context: [ยง414-352] Notice of intent to demand payment. (a) If proposed corporate action creating dissenters&rsquo; rights under section 414-342 is submitted to a vote at a shareholders&rsquo; meeting, a shareholder who wishes to assert dissenters&rsquo; rights: (1) Must deliver to the corporation before the vote is taken written notice of the shareholder&rsquo;s intent to demand payment for the shareholder&rsquo;s shares if the proposed action is effectuated; and (2) Must not vote the shareholder&rsquo;s shares in favor of the proposed action. (b) A shareholder who does not satisfy the requirements of subsection (a) is not entitled to payment for the shareholder&rsquo;s shares under this part. [L 2000, c 244, pt of ยง1]
